description: This file contains utility functions for text normalization, tokenization, TF-IDF calculation, and cosine similarity, specifically designed for matching job-related texts such as resumes and job descriptions using TF-IDF vectorization.

methods.name: normalizeText
methods.description: Normalizes input text by converting to lowercase, removing non-alphanumeric characters (except '+'), and trimming whitespace.

methods.name: tokenize
methods.description: Splits normalized text into tokens, filtering out stop words.

methods.name: termFrequencies
methods.description: Calculates normalized term frequency (TF) for a list of tokens.

methods.name: documentFrequencies
methods.description: Calculates document frequency (DF) for terms across multiple tokenized documents.

methods.name: idfScores
methods.description: Computes IDF scores for terms based on document frequencies with smoothing.

methods.name: buildVector
methods.description: Builds a TF-IDF weighted vector from term frequencies and IDF scores.

methods.name: dotProduct
methods.description: Calculates dot product between two vectors.

methods.name: magnitude
methods.description: Calculates the magnitude (Euclidean norm) of a vector.

methods.name: cosineSimilarity
methods.description: Computes cosine similarity between two vectors.

methods.name: tfidfCosineMatch
methods.description: Computes TF-IDF cosine similarity scores between a query string and a list of document objects, returning sorted results.

methods.name: buildJobDocumentText
methods.description: Constructs a combined searchable text string from a job object, including title, company, location, summary, description, and skills.
